poem:
### Three Years

In the charred husk,  
remnants of whispers—  
three years stretch like shadows.  
The broken,  
in still smoldering dreams,  
wait for the dawn  
where justice murmurs  
among the ruins.  
Echoes bear the weight,  
grief made visible  
in the lingering  
ash of time.
